page.title: 08A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: I{get up}at about{7.45 a.m.}and {help}my dad{feed}the{farm animals}- 9 {lambs,}3{cows,}6{geese,}1{cock}and 7 {hens.}Then I have a{breakfast}of {cornflakes}and{toast}at{8.30.}I{help dad{afterwards}and then{look after {Katie,}my five month old{sister,}if she's awake, while{mum}does{the {washing.}Then I{play}with{my older {sister, Elizabeth(8),}until a{dinner of{chicken soup}and{bread.}Then we{get ready to{go}to my{Grandma's}at {Arnside,}about{10 miles away.}For{tea at{Grandma's,}we have{beef,}roast potatoes,{carrots,}peas,{cabbage and gravy{followed}by{blackcurrant pie}and {custard or trifle}and then{cheese}and {crackers.}Then we{watch television until{9 p.m.}when we{go home.}We get {home}at{9.45 p.m.}and I{go}to{bed.
